title: Question 9
description: How many tokens are released each week?

fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
For the first week when Yield Farming started: 
-Farming: 32,000 $BOND 
-Team: 22,000 $BOND 
**-Total: 54,000 $BOND** 

 For the next weeks: 
-Farming: 32,000 $BOND 
-LP Incentivization: 20,000 $BOND 
-Team: 22,000 $BOND 
**-Total: 74,000 $BOND**
